uses: Using a fork as a hair accessory by twisting it into the hair for a funky, edgy look.
Creating a miniature fork sculpture by bending and shaping the tines into different designs.
Using a fork as a gardening tool to help aerate soil in potted plants.
Using a fork as a bookmark by sticking it in between the pages of a book.
Using a fork as a back scratcher for hard-to-reach spots.
Using a fork as a template for painting polka dots or other designs on a canvas or fabric.
Using a fork as a cookie cutter to make fun shapes out of dough or fondant.
Using a fork as a makeshift guitar pick for impromptu jam sessions.
Using a fork as a weapon in a DIY self-defense class.
Using a fork as a tool to stencil patterns onto walls or furniture for a unique decorative touch.
